name: Dynamic Pricing and Discount Rules
author: ThemeHigh

sections.description:
The Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce plugin provides you the option to set up separate discount rules for both the product and cart details. Using this plugin, you can create bulk pricing based on the quantity range and increase your sales to its next level.

Also, you can choose the products for applying discount rules depending on the product details like the product category and selling price.

Features of WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing Plugin

  • User-friendly UX design that lets you quickly define the discount rules.
  • Users can easily enable or disable the discount rules.
  • Option to set discount rules separately for the product and cart pricing.
  • Percentage or fixed discount.
  • Easy to duplicate a WooCommerce discount rule that is already created.
  • Discount Rules can be made for both simple and variable products.
  • Option to reset all the changes made with a single click.
  • Set discount rules as per the conditions you set.
  • Apply the discount rule with other applicable rules, or discard other rules and apply the discount rule.

Set Discount rules based on:

👉 Date & Time

Give a discount to the shoppers when they purchase on a specific time interval or on a particular day that you set.

👉 Cart Details

Offer a special discount price to the shoppers based on their cart details like cart quantity, number of products in the cart, the total amount of the cart, etc.

So, you can provide an additional discount to the shoppers when the shopper is having a required number of items or when the cart total is above a specified amount.

👉 User Roles

Give a special discount to the users based on their roles like subscribers, contributors, and much more.

👉 Products & Product Categories

Give a discount when the shopper purchases a particular product or any products from a selected category.

👉 Product Sale Price

Offer an additional discount based on the sale price of the WooCommerce products.

👉 Quantity Range

Set discount rules based on the quantity range of each product.

👉 Fixed/Percentage Discount

The Plugin provides both the fixed/percentage discount. You can choose any of them as per your preference.

👉 Examples of Setting Discount Rules

  • Get 20% off while purchasing products from the electronics category.
  • Get a 10% additional discount for our subscribers.
  • Shop this Christmas to get a discount of up to 50%.
  • Special offer on men’s fashion. The offer ends at today 9:00 PM.
  • Lowest Prices Ever! Up To 60% off on the purchase of Nike sport shoes.
  • Get a 10% additional discount for shoppers whose cart contains more than three products.
  • Get a 30% off while purchasing above $100.

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WooCommerce 4.0 or greater
  • WordPress 5.2 or greater

Automatic installation

  1. Log in to your WordPress dashboard.
  2. Navigate to the Plugins menu, and click “Add New”.
  3. Search and locate ‘Discount and Dynamic Pricing’ plugin.
  4. Click ‘Install Now’, and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the ‘Discount and Dynamic Pricing’ plugin and uploading it to your web server via your FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
How can I add and manage discount rules for WooCommerce?

Navigate to Dashboard > WooCommerce > Discount Rules.
From here, you can add and manage the discount rules by using all the given conditions.

How many discount rules can I add for a product?

You can add as many discount rules as you need. There is no limit defined.

Is dynamic pricing and discount rules plugin responsive to WordPress?

Discount and Dynamic Pricing plugin is completely responsive to WordPress.

Can I set WooCommerce discount rules based on shopper’s cart details?

Yes, you can set discount rules based on shopper’s cart details like cart total quantity, cart item count, and cart total amount.

Can I apply the discount rule for all products?

Yes, you can apply the discount rule to all products in your store. Choose the products and product categories from Product Pricing > Apply Product.

How can I apply WooCommerce bulk discounts?

To apply bulk discounts,
1. Navigate to WooCommerce > Discount rules.
2. From the Product Rules tab, click on the Add new rule button.
3. From the popup that appears, choose the method as a Bulk discount. Enter the minimum and maximum quantity required for bulk discount.Also, mention along with the discount amount you wish to provide.
4. Once all the details are added, save the changes made.

How can I apply cart discounts?

To apply for cart discounts,
1. Navigate to WooCommerce > Discount rules.
2. From the Cart Rules tab, click on the Add new rule button. A popup will appear.
3. Provide the corresponding details for the discount rule
4. Once completed, save the changes made.
sections.changelog:
2.2.6

  • Added WooCommerce 8.7 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.5 compatibility.

2.2.5

  • Added WooCommerce 8.3 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.4 compatibility.

2.2.4

  • Added WooCommerce 8.0 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.3 compatibility.

2.2.3

  • Fixed the issue of cart rule when a user logged in from checkout page.
  • Added WooCommerce 7.8 compatibility.
  • Added compatibility with HPOS(High-Performance order storage).

2.2.2

  • Added WooCommerce 7.5 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.2 compatibility.

2.2.1

  • Added WooCommerce 7.0 compatibility.
  • Fixed the warning issue with the Query Monitor plugin.

2.2.0

  • Fixed the issue when applying discount rules for specific categories.
  • Added WooCommerce 6.9 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.1 compatibility.
  • Added strikeout price settings.
  • Added Advanced settings tab.
  • Added an option to display bulk discount details as a table on the product page.

2.1.2

  • Fixed the conflicts while adding multiple discount rules.
  • Fixed the issue of showing negative prices on the cart.
  • Improved the validations for the price fields on the discount rule form.
  • Added WooCommerce 6.7 compatibility.

2.1.1

  • Fixed the minicart product price issue.
  • Fixed the cart striking price issue.
  • Fixed the listing of products in the edit rule screen.
  • Added WooCommerce 6.6.0 compatibility.

2.1.0

  • Added WooCommerce 6.5.1 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress version 6.0 compatibility.
  • Added a filter to modify the striking of regular and sale prices on the cart page.
  • Added compatibility with WPML and Loco Translate Plugin.
  • Added POT file.

2.0.3

  • Added WooCommerce version 6.0.0 compatibility.

2.0.2

  • Added WooCommerce version 5.9.0 compatibility.

2.0.1

  • Added WordPress 5.8 compatibility.
  • Added WooCommerce version 5.7.1 compatibility.

2.0.0

  • Settings page design improved.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
  • Create discount rules for products.
  • Create discount rules for cart.
  • Apply discount rules based on user roles.
  • Apply discount rules based on product, category.
  • Apply discount rules based on cart totals, cart quantity.

sections.reviews:
This plugin is excellent. It Works very well.

By Wilson Santana Q. de Oliveira (oliveira7) on December 25, 2023


This plugin works very well. I recommend.

Has a "Conditional" rule that the other's don't.

By Jonathan Hinson (snugsite) on November 23, 2023

Just want to save others some time here. I tested every free Bulk Discount Plugin I could find, and this is the only one that provided 'Category specific rules' in the free version. The other plugins I tested were very limited to the point of being unusable for most use cases, without buying a 'Pro Upgrade'.

This plugin did exactly what I needed, with a very easy to us interface.

free and working well!

By Chris (christianmuellerdhv) on May 25, 2023

The only free plugin wich supports rolebased prices without bugs. Other Plugins are not working well with variants (only in PRO-Versions supported) and/or chained products (price not correct in the basket) and it is not possivble to watch all dicounts on one site or in the product list.

With this Plugin all this is supported.

outstanding support

By benitokeller on May 10, 2023

I had an issue which will be addressed in the new release (next update). The support team just solved the issue in no time and sent a bridge plugin for instant cure of the issue. Perfect job! Thank you!

Excellent!!! And Free!!!

By amslps on February 24, 2023

Open resources and free! It is best to do any discounts, including category discount that others always charged at least $50 per year!!! Another reason I prefer is its back end and front end is so simple that it can prevent from any bloating css and js to slow down my site. That's the point I always write code to eliminate the unnecessary plugins. Anyway, It is adequate for most e-commerce site. Currently I haven't found any bugs. Hope it can continue to update!

Not a viable option

By balvan64 on October 30, 2022

Not a viable option 1. On Sale products do not appear with the shortcode [sale_products]. 2. Sale price is not outputted with WooCommerce product Schema, it seems the price change is just cosmetic. 3. No Sale badge

Works as required

By vaibhavvinayaka on June 24, 2022

Works as required 4 stars as plugin does not show the discount to user

Outstanding Support

By rinsha on July 13, 2021

Product is quite nice, Support they providing is outstanding

short_description: Dynamic Pricing Plugin lets you create special discounts for your customers based on product and cart details.
